name: Sniper Guard Mission - Be the defender of the girl of chief
name_original: Sniper Guard Mission - Be the defender of the girl of chief
description:
"Be an efficient security guard and face the expert killers who are on the mission to kill the daughter of president Nambalo’s royal family. The proficient mafia killers are on the verge to kill Nimirani the daughter of President. You being the expert sniper shooter has the duty to save her life from these enemies of humanity.
Hold tight your gun and come forth to fight experienced shooters. The shooters are coming in the form of groups and high targets are shown with green lights. You need to shoot them all and save the life of the apple of the eyes of president.
GAMEPLAY FEATURES
Multiple levels boosts up your passion.
Easy to run and shoot.
Easy Controls.
Wider area to move around.
Easy to use different weapons.
SAVE THE LIFE OF INNICENT AND BECOME HER HERO

Utilize the skills that you have mastered with the passage of time and shoot the enemies of humanity. Use the weapons provided to save the life by shooting the mafia killers. Jump in the real situation, face and shoot the enemies to rescue the life of the girl and be her real hero and live the life of legend."
